skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Shivering Malady

Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn, then places a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Transmuter
